title: I’m sick and tired of remakes
body:
I finally get the role I want, then kapow! Other team remakes! We get no reward, and 15 minutes of my life was wasted. Fun!
Edit: there’s also the thrill of letting the enemy know what champ to ban!

replies.body: Last time I re-call, remakes were 3 minutes, were they not?
He's factoring in que times and champ select
And in bronze. the player that doesn’t load takes a long time in the loading screen.
